00002 #define vbl_checked_delete_h_

00022 //  Modified from the original boost sources to fit the VXL restrictions.
00023 
00024 //: Checks that T is complete and deletes x.
00025 // Not to be used on arrays!
00026 template<class T>
00027 inline
00028 void vbl_checked_delete(T * x)
00029 {
00030     // intentionally complex - simplification causes regressions
00031     typedef char type_must_be_complete[ sizeof(T)? 1: -1 ];
00032     (void) sizeof(type_must_be_complete);
00033     delete x;
00034 }
00035 
00036 //: Checks that T is complete and array deletes x.
00037 template<class T>
00038 inline
00039 void vbl_checked_delete_array(T * x)
00040 {
00041     typedef char type_must_be_complete[ sizeof(T)? 1: -1 ];
00042     (void) sizeof(type_must_be_complete);
00043     delete [] x;
00044 }
00045 
00046 #endif  // vbl_checked_delete_h_
